form.label: Overview
form.description: Includes statistics for both queue and non-queue calls

search.query: `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:calls" | dedup host, call_id, seg_order | fields host, act_*, answer_time, call_*, dst_*, recording_url, seg_*, src_* | sort 0 -call_id, + seg_order | stats latest(_time) as _time, first(call_dir) as f_call_dir, last(call_*) as l_call_*, list(*) as * by host, call_id | rename l_call_* as call_*, f_call_dir as call_dir
`default_index` | lookup host_lookup.csv host OUTPUT hostname | eval officeNames = if(isnull(hostname),host,hostname) | dedup officeNames | table host, officeNames | sort + host
index=* | head 1 | eval current_time_zone=strftime(now(),"%Z") | table current_time_zone
| search $hosts1$ ($callDir$) | eval status = if(call_is_answered="t","Answered","Unanswered") | timechart count by status span=1d

panel.title: Daily Call Expectancy vs Agent Logins

search.query: | search $hosts1$ ($callDir$) | timechart span=1h count by call_dir | eval Hour=strftime(_time,"%H") | stats $tkn_aggregation_call$(*) as * by Hour | append [| search `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queue_agent_logins" $hosts1$ earliest=$tkn_extra_earliest_time$ latest=$tkn_extra_latest_time$ | dedup host, idcallcent_ag_queuestatus | transaction host, q_num agent_num startswith="is_loggedin_in_queue=t" endswith="is_loggedin_in_queue=f" keepevicted=t | search eventcount=2 | eval login_time=strptime(mvindex(timeofupdate,0), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), logout_time=strptime(mvindex(timeofupdate,1), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | dedup host, agent_num, login_time | where duration>$tkn_agent_login_less_than$ | eval time = mvrange(login_time,logout_time,"1h") | mvexpand time | where time>=$tkn_earliest_time$ AND time<=$tkn_latest_time$ | eval _time = time | timechart span=1h count | eval Hour=strftime(_time,"%H") | stats $tkn_aggregation_call$(count) as Agents_LoggedIn by Hour] | stats first(*) as * by Hour | fillnull Agents_LoggedIn value=0 | eval Agents_LoggedIn=if($tkn_aggregation_call|s$="avg", round(Agents_LoggedIn, 1), Agents_LoggedIn), Inbound=if($tkn_aggregation_call|s$="avg", round(Inbound, 1), Inbound), Outbound=if($tkn_aggregation_call|s$="avg", round(Outbound, 1), Outbound)

| search $hosts1$ ($callDir$) | eval hourOfCall=strftime(_time,"%H") | eval timeOfDay = case(hourOfCall<6, "Early Morning", hourOfCall>5 AND hourOfCall<12, "Morning", hourOfCall>11 AND hourOfCall<17, "Afternoon", hourOfCall>16, "Evening") | stats count as "Calls" by timeOfDay | rename timeOfDay as "Time of Day"
`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls" $hosts1$ | dedup host, queuecall_id | chart count AS QCalls by host, q_name
`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls" $hosts1$ | dedup host, queuecall_id | eval breaches = if(tot_ringing_sec>30,1,0) | chart sum(breaches) as "SLA Breaches" by host, q_name

| search $hosts1$ ($callDir$) | eval ringing_dur = if(isnull(call_ringing_dur) OR call_ringing_dur="00:00:00.000000" OR call_ringing_dur="00:00:00.00000", "00:00:00.000", strftime(strptime(call_ringing_dur, "%H:%M:%S.%3N"), "%H:%M:%S.%3N")) | eval talking_dur = if(isnull(call_talking_dur) OR call_talking_dur="00:00:00.000000" OR call_ringing_dur="00:00:00.00000", "00:00:00.000",strftime(strptime(call_talking_dur, "%H:%M:%S.%3N"), "%H:%M:%S.%3N")) | rex field=ringing_dur "(?<hour>\d{2}):(?<minute>\d{2}):(?<second>\d{2})\.(?<microsecond>\d{3})" | eval ringing = hour*3600 + minute*60 + second + microsecond/1000 | rex field=talking_dur "(?<hour>\d{2}):(?<minute>\d{2}):(?<second>\d{2})\.(?<microsecond>\d{3})" | eval talking = hour*3600 + minute*60 + second + microsecond/1000 | eval duration = tostring(round(ringing + talking, 3), "duration") | eval ans = if(call_is_answered = "f","Call was not answered", "Call was answered") | eval caller_number=mvindex(src_caller_number, 0, 0) | rename call_start_time as "Start Time", duration as Duration, ringing_dur as "Ringing (s)", talking_dur as "Talking (s)", caller_number as "Caller", call_is_answered as Answered, ans as "Call Outcome" | table host, call_id, "Start Time", "Caller", Duration, "Ringing (s)", "Talking (s)", "Call Outcome" | sort "Start Time" by DESC
